title: Mini games during Ranked Queue?
body:
I was having a thought the other day when I was waiting for ~~Bronze 4 queue~~ and I was thinking since League is trying to reduce the queue times.
Why don't they add something to entertain people in the meantime? 
It could be something as little as tetris with another player in queue or something along those lines?
Just a thought

replies.body: Isn't that what Pokémon is for?

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u0IzK3FE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-05T06:47:17.477+0000)
>
> Isn't that what Pokémon is for?

Get out.

I'm not saying I don't like the idea. It would be pretty cool if Riot implemented it, but I would prefer for Riot to work more on improving the game.

There's tons of cool browser games you can play while in queue, my friends and I play Realm of the Mad God from time to time, which is a perfect game just for chilling with while in queues.
